website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best breast pump available. Hospital-grade quality at surprisingly affordable price.
pros: Ideal to take along or for infrequent pumping at home
Double pumping kit is incredibly effective and allows you to pump one or both breasts
cons: Expensive, but you are you paying for the quality and performance

customer_reviews.title: The item was shipped in the box of the manufacturer(not ...
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped in the box of the manufacturer(not amazon box) Security seal in the box was open. All parts inside the box looks used and plastics were broken too. A/C adapter cable was rolled out by hand. Since this is a hygienic item I don’t want it in the conditions it was received.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge R.

customer_reviews.title: Great pump -DO NOT BUY FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: Great pump - DO NOT BUY FROM AMAZON This is a great pump for me, quiet, easy to use, clear instructions, the tote bag is nice to have, but Amazon ships this directly in the manufactures box, not protected at all, and the first one had the seal broken. This is a personal care item, the box it not large, no reason it couldn't be shipped in an amazon box.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: NEW Pump In Style-read before buying
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 breast pumps including this one and this one happens to be the loudest. It also vibrates while it's on, causing more noise if its on a hard surface. The suction is a bit much but you can get used to it fairly quickly if your nipples are already sore. I have noticed I get more milk after pumping but that could also be because I go longer stretches of time in between sessions. Rechargeable batteries (AA) needed for battery pack and only 21 and 24 size flangs are included. Unfortunately, I needed size 27.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Better than Spectra S1
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump because I got a Spectra S1 through my insurance and it was horrible! I’m not sure why everyone loves it. I’ve owned a Medela Freestyle in the past and I loved it but I didn’t want to pay that much for a pump again. This one is just as good if not better than the freestyle. I get more milk with this pump than I do with the spectra, it’s more gentle on my nips, and it’s smaller! UPDATE!!! It just stopped working after 5 months of use!
customer_reviews.author: Karmen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed... highly overrated pump
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this pump but ended up quite disappointed. Worked well for a little while, ended up getting a replacement from medela and that one quit too. Very loud. Switched to a spectra. Would highly recommend spectra over the PISA, better suction, more natural feeling. Quieter. Overall a much better pumping experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jenbry

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE, MISSING ITEMS
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the following that was listed in the product description: (1) Removable cooler bag (1) contoured ice pack (4) 5-oz. 150 mL breast milk bottles with lids (1) set of PersonalFitTM Breast Shields in two sizes – 24mm and 27mm (2) breast shield connectors (2) valves (1) Instructions for Use All I received were: (1) Built-in Pump in Style Advanced breast pump (1) set of tubing (1) AC adaptor (1) Portable battery pack for added convenience and easy mobility Not Happy - DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Holly Spino

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product! I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am so impressed. I have had a variety of breast pumps through 3 kids and many years of pumping and this one is outstanding. The flanges are much more comfortable that the typical all plastic, the pump is very quiet, and suction is great (rivals the Medela hospital grade pump) and gentle. Set up was very easy. The battery pack helps with mobility, but I wouldn’t consider it the most portable pump (like if I wanted to do dishes or something while moving around). It’s nice and compact and simple to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It barely sucks now and it is basically more productive to hand ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was born in November and I have been using this pump for about 6 weeks 1-2 times a day for 10-15 minutes. The motor was much more powerful the first month. In the last two weeks it has become much weaker. It barely sucks now and it is basically more productive to hand express. I have friends who used this same pump for over a year but there is no way this will be effective when I return to work. Sounds like a good product as long as you don’t get a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: DLMWS

customer_reviews.title: Great design and suction
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pump and I especially like the design and how potable it is. Also the cord is linked so it’s not made up of two separate super long cords. Milk doesn’t back up and the suction is great. I really like the closed system but wish the top section was clear so you can see a bit easier if milk stopped producing. Other than that I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: The sucking is not consistent and sounds like air is constantly escaping. The valves constantly pop with each suction spraying each milk drop. Yes, I tried different valves in hopes it would fix. It is also pretty loud. I am not impressed and a bit upset I wasted $199. I will stick with the Maxi Swing and my spectra S2. Just not worth the money on this one. Only plus, the tote is a smart design.
customer_reviews.author: KAI3773

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: This pump feels very dated - it really needs a refresher. The one I received was incredibly loud, I pump at work with my office door shut and my coworkers in the next office could hear the machine. The suction was also quite weak to me, I didn’t get nearly as much milk out as I did with the one my hospital gave me for free. Wanted to see if it was worth the $$$ and it definitely is not. Pro - the extra accessories are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Visually appealing
customer_reviews.text: I personally was not thrilled with the new pump. I have the old version and have had more success with it and production of milk. While I’m nearing the end of my breastfeeding and pumping-I am trying to save every drop. Pros: Visually more appealing, smaller and easier to travel with. Less small parts. Cons Suction appears to be weak, flange did not appear to work well for my breast type-tried both sizes, noisy. Tubing and extension cord seem short. I’m going to keep trying to use it and find a way to be more successful with it. I will Update. Only have had for a week
customer_reviews.author: Heather Werenski

customer_reviews.title: Best breastfeeding pump ever
customer_reviews.text: By far better pump when compared to the crappy ameda pump my insurance would pay for. The ameda broke after several uses and doesn’t effectively suck out milk. This pump is awesome i can get let down and milk pumped quickly and comfortably. ***Hint instead of buying a pumping bra just get a tight fitting tank top for under $5 from goodwill and cut nipple holes large enough to hold pump in place. ***additionally be prepared to have to purchase larger nipple cones i needed 30mm versus the ones that came with pump, luckily the lactation nurses fitted me at the hospital and were able to give me the larger size for free before i left
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Daughter wouldn't stay awake at the breast so my production was low and she was losing weight. I started pumping to feed her instead to get her weight up and still allow her to have breastmilk. Without this, I think we'd be a formula family. I'm so greatful I have it. Also, it's easy to toss all the parts and bottles in it so I can take her to grandma's house and still be able to pump, and when I go back to work I'll be able to carry this in and out without feeling like a cow on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Low suction on higher setting
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about madela products so I decided to purchase this items as most of the comments were great, however one person complained about a funny noise when they increased the suction and getting less power and I ignored that comment and purchased the item anyway and now I am regretting it. I am experienced the same problem. When I first used this product it worked so great so I am disappointed. the only reason I still gave it two stars is because the pump still works but not very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Slightly loud but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got a different pump that was covered by my insurance and it was awful, so I got this one out of pocket. It was between this one and the Spectra pump. This one does do a great job of emptying my breasts, and it is easy to travel with, however the noise level is slightly high. But honestly overall, with how well this pump functions and me being an exclusive pumper, i will gladly deal with the noise. Love this pump!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Keim

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Hadn’t
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn’t bought this pump. It was “good enough” for most people I spoke to who had it but once you try other brands (Spectra, or hospital grade pumps) you realize that this pump is so uncomfortable. Despite having the right size phalanges this pump was so rough compared to the others. My insurance doesn’t cover more than a manual pump and I’m sorry that I spent money on this one. Ended up renting a hospital grade pump and buying a Spectra instead per recommendation of my lactation consultant. If you can buy a Spectra instead, do it.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: I use this pump at work each day. It is so fast! I am able to pump 10 ounces in 10 minutes. I have used over 4 different pumps and this is by far the fastest I've experienced. The only complaints I would have would be that I need to be plugged into a power source (or batteries) and that it is not super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Little

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this, very convenient for mommys at work or traveling. Do not expect high power suction. It comes with everything you see. I went with Medela because I used this brand at the hospital, when my baby hero was in the ICU, the industrial presentations are awesome, best suction ever. Medela products are made to last, you do not expend, you invest. It's important to follow cleaning instructions, there are videos available. Highly recommended! I live in Costa Rica and this product is overpriced here (well... everything). A very good friend of mine brought this to me, so I did not pay for extra fees.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic pump that gets the job done. Some of the cons are that it’s very loud and doesn’t have a digital screen with a timer or a way to see when you’re changing the levels. The good things are the shields are comfortable and the pump is portable. It’s small and has a battery charger so you could take it on the go easily. It also comes with a nice cooler bag and ice pack which fits the Medela bottles perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie L.

customer_reviews.title: Medela is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't stand my motif so I bought this. I had this pump without the tote with my first two kids and it was perfect. My baby was a preemie so I used the symphony rented from the hospital for a month and loved it. Then I used the motif and was like.. This is bogus. So I bought this. I don't like how it fits in the bag and it is noisy but it is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ksinge

customer_reviews.title: My go to pump
customer_reviews.text: I had this pump with my first baby and loved it! I had a different one with my second through my insurance and it just wasn’t as great and had me missing my Medela. I’m pregnant with my third and bought this pump again! I have never had a problem. It’s easy to use and hide if you need to take it with you somewhere. The cooler is great and I take it in my diaper bag with my milk for baby. The storage bags and containers are great as well!! I live and trust Medela.
customer_reviews.author: McCall

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with this pump. It’s comfortable to use and the power is much better than the old pump in style. I’ve been using a hospital grade pump since the other Medela did not pump well. I have since returned my rental on the big pump as this one is fine. I like the closed tubes system, makes me feel better that it’s cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Lozcoe

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: This breast pump worked really well. I was able to increase or decrease the level of suction based on my preference but I usually kept it at what it was programmed since that worked for me. This pump is easy to move and use since it’s so small. The parts are easy to take apart and clean and reassemble. The one thing I didn’t like is that when I only needed to pump one side both bottles need to be plugged in for it to work. Without both bottles plugged in it wouldn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Small in size, great in power.
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfortable than the spectra. This one fits my smaller nipples beautifully and is no problem for larger breasts. While there is no light or timer likevthe spectra, the size and mobility make up for it. I pump in 15 min what takes 30 with my spectra.
customer_reviews.author: Ziyona

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. It is the flimsy, cheapest thing I’ve encountered on the market. I was a huge medela fan, I used the freestyle from 2017 for 18 months. I had used my pump often so freestyle didn’t last much second time around so checked this out. I hate that you have no sense of time, suction speed and that you just be plugged in. It is really so bad, major waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Pass! Not portable, no increase in milk :(
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! The product images make it seem like this pump is portable but you have to be plugged into the wall or battery pack! Also definitely did not give me an increase in milk like it promises. Additionally, mine has a terribly loud knocking sound which I don’t know if that is supposed to happen or if I got a defective one. Wish I could return for a different Medela pump :(
customer_reviews.author: Katie Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Travel bag is a bonus for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only brand I have trusted for all three of my babies. I had two of these, one I kept at work and one I kept at home. The suction was great for me no complaints. I successfully breastfed each baby 2 yrs with the help of this pump. Easy to clean material on the bag and ice bag. The ice pack was great and fit perfectly with 4 bottles. I love the discreet bag for travel and everything fit nicely. Highly recommend for traveling and working moms
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, bulky, and lost suction after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This pump looks nice in the bag but the cons definitely outweigh the pros. It’s very bulky so you really have to stay put while you’re pumping. It was also really heavy and cumbersome to travel with. It seemed to loose suction after only a couple of weeks. I ended up buying the Ameda Mya pump and love that one. I don’t use my Medela any more. The benefits of the Ameda pump were: it’s small and easily portable, it has a rechargeable battery and it has a timer on the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kamprath

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easy
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing and SUPER convenient for traveling. You literally take it anywhere! If there’s no power outlet around it has a battery powered battery to use. It also has great suction. A neighbor recommended it and I’m so glad she did makes life easier!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hern

customer_reviews.title: Cracked bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This review would be much more positive if the pump hadn't come with a cracked bottle. Breastfeeding and pumping is challenging enough on its own. Having half an ounce of breast milk drip all over your lap while you are trying to increase your supply and start a freezer stash is heartbreaking! I'm short bottles after the first use... The pump itself works just fine and the carrying bag is surprisingly fashionable. The battery option, cooler and ice pack are nice additions. I do wish you could order this pump with specific size breast shields. I had to order a separate size in addition to what came with the pump.
customer_reviews.author: R. French

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: The pump break after 3 month, contacted manufacture and they advice to return it to Amazon, Amazon accepted my return but never mention about restocking fee. Have to call Amazon again and find out they are charging restocking fee for a broken item. What a waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Yeung

customer_reviews.title: New pump
customer_reviews.text: This pumps has it’s pros and cons. I really like how lite weight the pump is versus the Sonata. The components are much simpler and easier to clean than earlier versions. However some of the items I did not care for. I personally like to see how long I have been pumping and at what level. This particular pump does not show you. It does have great suction and it’s definitely has a kick to it. I also didn’t care for how it had to be either plugged into the wall or on batteries. In comparing the Medela pumps I do have, I do prefer the Sonata.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great pump / Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this. No complaints. Uses the same parts as the pump we used in the hospital 🏥— works just as well. The lactation nurse/assistant recommended this model instead of the more expensive, and after use we agree. ✅ Pumps well ✅ 4X 5 oz bottles, freezer pack + case ✅ Stylish and simple backpack ✅ AC wall adapter ✅ Battery pack adapter (uses 8 AAs) ✅ Great price Totally recommend 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but pump isn't durable
customer_reviews.text: The carrying system and accessories are really convenient but the pump itself is not durable. Within a couple weeks the part that plugs one side if you're only pumping one breast ripped. I guess I pushed the part too hard because I wasn't sure if it was plugging it correctly and punctured a hole through it. The pump itself struggles after the let down. The consistent, slower pump starts to sound like it's hiccuping which throws off the natural sucking simulation. I still get good sessions but I've only used it for three months, one month consistently after I went back to work, so it's kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Arkie

customer_reviews.title: Better overall results
customer_reviews.text: This pump is lighter and way more convenient to transport. The shields are shaped better to fit and there more comfortable then the full plastic shields. The silicone rim gives a better fit. The suction power is better then other pumps ive tried and produces let down faster. This pump also increased my supply from a .25 oz to .50 oz per session within a week. It also took my pumping session down in time. I would recommend this pump to anyone and actually already have. Its there best pump yet and I've tried a few.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pump on the market
customer_reviews.text: Simple as that! it is quiet, efficient and just what you need. It is totally worth the price even if the insurance doesn't cover it like ours - don't cheap out as you'll regret it. The only advice I have, if you want to use the portable AAx8 battery pack, I would get rechargeable lithium ion batteries so they last longer and you don't spend nearly as much replacing batteries. And get multiple power packs to leave one by the bed and one downstairs (and anywhere else you want - p.s. get them from eBay as they're much cheaper).
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great suction.
customer_reviews.text: The new Medela pump in style with max flow was really nice. I really enjoyed the fact it has less parts. The travel bag was really convenient and well insulated. The pump itself had amazing suction and the vibrations truly helped get a little more milk. I’d definitely recommend this pump to anyone who asked about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Not travel friendly
customer_reviews.text: This product was great until I brought it with me for the first time in a short car ride to my parents house. When I opened it back up it was broken. The face of the pump is no longer securely connected to the machine itself and does not work nearly as well as it used it and is very noisy. A couple of very small pieces broke off in the transport. Not travel friendly at all and I was very gentle with it. Very unhappy with this as I cannot afford to get a new one but can also not afford to not pump.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pumping moms!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Medela Pump In Style because I was not satisfied with my free pump that I got through my insurance. I was having issues with my supply and although the pump was not the solution it did help. I especially liked that it was a backpack. It was great to have my hands available to carry my million other bags (purse, laptop bag, and lunch). The pump works great and I am 100% satisfied. I recommend this to all my soon-to-be mommy friends.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Better than the hospitals
customer_reviews.text: I spent a week in the hospital using their $2,000 hospital grade pump and was miserable. I was so worried that when I got home to use my affordable Medela pump that it would be even worse. To my surprise I could pump 10 oz in a matter of 10 minutes compared to the 45 minutes it was taking at the hospital to get 6. As a bonus all of the accessories are inexpensive as well.
customer_reviews.author: MOMSlist

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is the greatest. Thing. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Holy mackerels. Such a lifesaver!! I’m an exclusive pumper for my 90th percentile child, and this backpack has saved my sanity! Equipped with a battery pack, the world is your oyster! Get a hands free nursing bra, and you’re off! There’s just enough storage inside for the parts that you need: pump apparatuses, bottles, breastmilk storage bags, my phone and a battery pack phone charger, even diapers and wipes! And don’t forget a snack! No wonder I no longer carry a purse, I don’t need to! As far as the quality of the pump itself? It’s a Medela — it works great! Parts are quick and easy to clean by hand, although my dishwasher is my BFF.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, powerful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the new Medela Pump in Style with MaxFlow and have been very pleased with my experience. The pump is compact and has a nice design, so I don’t mind leaving it out on my nightstand. Despite its compact size, it’s powerful and I found that it is very efficient. That means, less time pumping and more rest in between sessions. The breast shields are curved and have a soft rim so it is more fitted and comfortable than regular breast shields. I love that it came with a cooler bag and pump bag which makes it perfect for transporting to and from work. Really happy with this pump and would recommend it to any new mother!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working & on the go Mom’s!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Medela, after having a NICU baby and using the hospital grade pump I knew my evenflo pump was not going to do it. The pump is strong and allows for excellent milk production. I love that the backpack has room for all your parts and milk storage, it will make it super easy for me when I go back to work.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew birch

customer_reviews.title: Great Pump!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome I like it way more than my previous pump with my first child I love the easy to carry bag and the sleek look of the pump I highly recommend this to anyone and all new moms!
customer_reviews.author: John Huff

customer_reviews.title: For exclusive pumping, the medela symphony is better
customer_reviews.text: Since my son was born with a cleft lip and palate, I have to pump to give him breast milk. This is an okay pump for when we travel weekly to his cleft treatment appointments but it doesn’t compare to the Medela Symphony hospital rental pump. The suction on the pump in style isn’t nearly as gentle and it takes nearly twice as long as the symphony. I do appreciate that the majority of the parts for the pump in style and symphony are interchangeable. Only the tubing is different.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Good portable pump
customer_reviews.text: I love the portability of the pump but wish the battery pack was rechargeable. The flanges weren't my favorite at first but I ended up actually liking the fit. They're not easy to slide on my hands free pump bra though.. I have to take the time to unlatch my bra and then attach to the bottles. I didnt feel the suction was the strongest.bi wish the pump had a suction control screen.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good long lasting pump
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a bit more room in the bag so I didn’t have to carry this AND a purse, and it was a bit of work to get it out and set it up every day at work. However, this lasted me through two children where I was working full time and for some occasional pumping with baby three. Towards the end of baby 2 the suction decreased significantly but it still got the job done! Not the noisiest or the most quiet pump. The ice pack and cooler always kept things chilled until the end of the day, and the bag can wipe clean easily. Overall a fabulous pump.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t suction enough
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed as I used this brand at the hospital and the suction was strong at only a level two. I turn this dial all the way up and it’s not enough to get a considerable amount of milk out. I would like to return and try another.
customer_reviews.author: Aariela

customer_reviews.title: Really good portable pump
customer_reviews.text: Love this pump. I got the spectra and i returned it and got this one instead. It s so portable discreatly, the bag is a regular bag that can be taken anywhere and everything fits inside it nicely even the hands free bra, the bags, bottles etc. I use it wih batteries whenever i an out (writing this review while pumping in car). Suction works on me way better than spectra. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Z.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great pump!
customer_reviews.text: Wife: This is my second one, Medela makes great pumps, fits perfectly, portable, very easy to use and clean and it doesn't break your pocket. I know there are other brands out there that may be good but so far this brand has been awesome , I only got a second one because I gave away my first one , my old one was still working and in great shape after using it for almost 2 years .
customer_reviews.author: The Williams family

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my Medela Pump in Style Advanced with backpack
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my Medela Pump in Style Advanced with backpack. This is actually my second Medela Pump in Style pump. I received my first as a gift and used it throughout my maternity leave. Upon returning to work last week, I realized that it was too much to carry my pump (in addition to all the parts) back and forth every day. So I purchased a second pump to leave at the office (insurance should pay for this one). I love my second pump as much as the first, and I actually like the backpack better than the "on the go tote."
customer_reviews.author: NoraZon

customer_reviews.title: Service
customer_reviews.text: Long story short: I bought the pump and ordered it to my sister's place in the USA so she can take it overseas to where i live. When i got it, i found out that one of the connectors is missing. After a lot of emails and chat conversation, i've been told that the only solution is to send it back to the USA, get a refund and then order the item again. (Instead of just sending a new connector which cost very cheap i guess). And if i'll buy it again and get one connector missing again? So i'll need to get the whole proccess again?! I guess we'll use only 50% of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Yahav

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t not last even two months!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned mine today. It did so good in the beginning! Lasted less than 2 months. Such a disappointment. The suction was terrible and the machine was loud. It’s easy to transport and wash but I wouldn’t recommend this one to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very Nosy. Also the system is a hassle to carry around to start it is the base of the bag. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renan

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this pump from my Spectra and it was such a great decision! This pump is quieter and easier to clean. The cups are much more comfortable, with the cushioned rim. The tubing is good, but it’s difficult to tell if it’s fully connected to the pieces because they don’t “click” together. The only thing that could make this pump better is if there was some sort of screen where I can see the suction power level and a timer. Overall this pump is incredibly easy to use and very portable. I would absolutely recommend this to any mom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pump model doesn’t come with bottle stands when bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This pump does not come with the bottle stands but if you buy this pump at a Target or Similar store it comes with the stands for the same price. I’m pretty bummed it doesn’t come with them. I contacted Medela to ask why and they responded that the pumps sold on Amazon doesn’t come with them and you cannot purchase the stands separately. Not happy about that. Other than that the pump works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a very cheap pump thinking that would be a good way to go since I would be mainly breastfeeding our son but turns out you sometimes get what you pay for and it just did not work. So my husband and I decided to spend the money on a Medela pump and I would make the same decision again in a heartbeat. It works great and the backpack is very practical and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: 5th baby, 3rd time purchasing medela! Love the carrying bag this pump comes in! Definitely makes it more portable!
customer_reviews.author: Tiphany

customer_reviews.title: Good but too big
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Medela so the pump per se is good. But this version is too big and not east to carry around and clean. After two years being a mom, I would advise other to-be-mothers to invest in the smaller version that you can carry in your own bag. You don’t need this whole backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda H.

customer_reviews.title: Parts always breaks
customer_reviews.text: This ia the second replacement pump they send. This machine is loud its not quite. The suctioning is not thay strong and im guessing its because the place to put the tubes always breaks. I have an old even flow and will just just that.
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: Got my hopes up for no reason
customer_reviews.text: I've had this item for 2 months. I loved it at the beginning because the suction was very strong. Now even at the highest level, the suction is not strong at all. It starts making like a weird humming sound when I turn it to the higher suction level. I think it is defective :/ and I'm so bummed because this pump had great reviews, which is the reason I bought it in the first place. If possible, I hope I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaykay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the Bellababy works even better for half the cost. Was disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Hennen

customer_reviews.title: Backpack size is small
customer_reviews.text: I love this pump and it works great! The only reason I dock it a star is because the backpack for me is a little small. I was really excited to have a backpack, and I was hoping I’d have enough room for snacks and stuff, but I have a hard time zipping it up with just the cooler. It wouldn’t have hurt if they made it just a little bigger. Otherwise it is a great purchase and I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one week
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump thinking the expensive price would ensure a great product. Despite sitting for a long time trying to pump, I could only get a few drips of milk out and it hurt! Then after about a week of use, the motor stopped working all together. I replaced it with a Bella Baby pump for $60 and got immediate results. Plus the Bella Baby has cushioned padding on the suction cups so the pain was much less. I was really disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Clair Brand

customer_reviews.title: THE best pump available.
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this pump! I am not worried at all about my supply when I head back to work because of this product! The faceplate on mine was actually broken upon arrival but one call to the company and they immediately sent me a new one that arrived literally within one mailing day! If you’re hesitant to purchase, stop! Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase! MILK SUPPLY INCREASED!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!!!!!! Love this. After 8 months of breast feeding my milk supply was starting to be less and less until I bought this wonderful pump. I love that I can take it anywhere. The back pack is of very good quality. I am so happy I listened to my husband. It was much more expensive at Target so we looked on Amazon and it was much much much less. I am happy and recommend this wonderful and easy to use pump.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So I went back and forth from medela to spectra.. Which one should I choose? I went with medela. It is great!!! The only con is that it is an open system so it is harder to clean. The tubes are the hardest to clean but it works. Next time I might go for the spectra and compare. I love the tote bag it is very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Best pump out there!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this pump. I was perfectly happy with my old pump-in-style that was still working like new after two years of pumping and two years in storage, but wanted one for home and one for my office. I tried upgrading to the Freestyle but was so disappointed with the comparison--I hated the Freestyle and returned it for this one. It's even better than the old model, which I was already perfectly happy with. It's so light-weight and less bulky. And I use it hands-free all the time just by strategically placing the bottles when I pump. Couldn't be happier with this pump and am surprised by reviews that report problems. Both of mine have been impressively durable!
customer_reviews.author: Momproff

customer_reviews.title: Returning mine sadly.
customer_reviews.text: Returning mine for a refund. Within a month of use the motor has severely slowed down and suction is very poor and will barely pump milk. Horrible performance for its price. Was expecting a little more ;(
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A little particular about positioning but works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, although it's a little particular about getting the nipple positioned exactly right, but overall works well. Tote is discreet and easy to use. There's definitely condensation in the tubes after use, so it's important to follow the instructions and let the pump run a bit to clear it.
customer_reviews.author: Brionna

customer_reviews.title: Had to Replace Twice
customer_reviews.text: I originally loved this pump, but after using a Spectra, I now see it’s obviously inferior to these newer pumps on the market. The first time it suddenly began to lose suction, customer service replaced it with another one. But when the second product showed the same issue in struggling to make suction (after much troubleshooting and shelling out money for replacement parts), I realised it was simply not a quality product. Fifteen minutes of pumping with Medela on max capacity gave me 3 oz from both breasts; seven minutes with the Spectra s2 on one breast gave me the same output. The winner is clear. Buy a Spectra instead.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great Breast Pump
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pump. I honestly liked it better than the pumps at the hospital. I didn't produce much milk ever during the time I nursed, but it did the job. It's powerful, but not painful when you do it properly. The quality was definitely there. I would recommend this pump to any nursing mother who wishes to pump in addition to feedings.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best pump! Important: Check you are using the right breast shield size for you.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this product! It was a life changer for my breastfeeding journey. I use it daily! VERY IMPORTANT: check you are using the correct breast shield size for you. It comes with a standard size but you may need different size in every breast. Using the correct size shield will make all the difference! The bag has a lot of space for storing bottles, wipes, the storage bags, a permanent marker and other things you may need on the go. It has a battery charger that is great when you are traveling, you can pump anywhere anytime!
customer_reviews.author: irma judith orrantia

customer_reviews.title: Best pump I've used
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for me. Has a battery pack and an AC adaptor so you can use it anywhere any time. The first pump I bought (Freemie) had absolutely no suction comapred to this one. It gets my supply moving in about 5 seconds and I hardly have the suction dialed up. No regrets buying this pump.
customer_reviews.author: SpidyChic

customer_reviews.title: first time parent used it pretty easy and functional good
customer_reviews.text: it is for travel purpose if you want use at home the bag is not so convenience. i had to take the machine out from the bag which is a metal box, they should have a cover for it so we can just use it either at home or travel.
customer_reviews.author: RainRain

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This review written by husband. We just had a baby later in life and this device is glorious. Not painful and very efficient. It’s a total package, the tote bag, all the included items are all that your need. Very portable, take it from room to room, place to place easily. Not too loud. My wife says this device has saved her sanity post partum
customer_reviews.author: busyguy

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: After 3 1/2 months of use a piece of the pump cracked and allows air loss so it will not function. Going to order a hospital grade pump that will be reliable. Low quality plastic parts really hurt this pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quicker let-down than other pumps
customer_reviews.text: This pump is very comfortable. I could barely tell I was pumping. Even though the pull isn't as noticeable as the older Medela pump and other pumps I've tried I still noticed a quicker let-down than those other pumps. It's also a bonus that the pump comes in a cute bag for stylish, easy transport.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: I use this pump while I was home with baby and now that I am back to work. It is nicely compact and gets the job done. Parts are easy to clean and this is a great deal for everything you get. The bag is discreetly chic. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Love the removable pump!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few different Medela pumps, and this is my favorite so far. I love that the pump comes out of the bag so that the big bag isn’t on my desk taking up space at work as I pump!
customer_reviews.author: CAng

customer_reviews.title: it works great, I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have been using this for 5 month, as a pumping mom. There is one thing I had to say, the ice cube inside the milk bag cannot be taken with you on a flight, you have to have it frozen first. Which made it impossible to bring with in a hot day. mine was taken away by airport security... other than that little thing, it works great, I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: What is this scratch?!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if we got the used item, however the bag has this scratch, for this price I expect better quality... we didn't try the device yet but if the bag is like this......
customer_reviews.author: Cenkc

customer_reviews.title: Medela Magic!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about the quality and versatility of this product. The company hit one out of the park! Everything was designed with mom and baby in mind and has worked perfectly. Everything arrived quickly and in perfect condition. This product will last easily through several children. If a new mom is breast feeding and wants the best for her and her child...this is one of the best investments we made. Kudos Medela! I will definitely recommend to all my friends and family and purchase additional products from you in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Y. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: The fact that this came in a purse like bag made pumping on the go so much stealthier
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this came in a purse like bag made pumping on the go so much stealthier. Nobody even knew it was a breast milk pump. Everything was very well thought out, the ice pack, and the battery pack for when there's no outlet. I carried this through the TSA no problem at airports. They had me remove the motor part of the bag and I was surprised how easy it was, everything was Velcroed together.
customer_reviews.author: Ditto

customer_reviews.title: Tote is roomy and the Pump is a pump
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specificly because it was a tote with a built in pump and I'm glad I did. The tote us roomy and fit all the pump supplies I needed. It also has a carrier for your pumped milk with a cooling pack inside. Be aware the pump isn't quiet. It's about the normal noise level of your average pump.
customer_reviews.author: cmw

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that the Velcro patch at the back of the bag has fallen off after two (2) months of use. Everything else was perfect. Works good, little to no noise, cooler bag and ice pack is also a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: Liseli C.

customer_reviews.title: Yes! I love this pump.
customer_reviews.text: This pump is much better than the Hygeia pump I got through my insurance. I was so relieved that this pump worked so well. Its quiet and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Irene L.

customer_reviews.title: In love with this pump
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought 2 other different brands. By far this is the best one. The only thing is that it is hard to clean( the tubing and bag). Otherwise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Cerecedo

customer_reviews.title: Best pump ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pump. It really helped my milk production even out. My nipples were a bit deformed from the barracuda baby so the pump suctions actually stretched them out. This brand was recommended by my lactation specialist.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Great for exclusive pumpers!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pump. I recently had to switch to exclusive pumping and needed a step up from the old Lansinoh I had from a few years back. I've brought this out with me using the battery pack with tremendous results. Just make sure to get the right size flanges!! These come with 24mm and I needed to purchase the 21mm. It was frustrating at first because it wasn't working well. So definitely read the instructions and trust them on sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Love this pump!!
customer_reviews.text: As someone like myself who is an exclusive pumper I needed more than one pump. I received a Mandela pump from my insurance company and wanted to purchase another one that came with a bag. I’ve had this pump a little over a week and so far it’s worked out great. The suction is strong and the noise level is quieter than the one I received from my insurance company. The bag, parts and cooler all came in great condition. Overall, I am very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: A working/traveling mom's dream!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this portable pump!! I bought it with my HSA money because it is considered lactation supplies. I take this to work everyday to pump and took it on a trip for the weekend. I even used it in an airport bathroom where there was no wall plug (used the battery pack as a backup and it works great). Buy this if you travel or have to lug a pump to work every day. You'll love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing one! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased! Would never buy anything else. I’m sorry I do not have photos available but I recommend this to anyone I know who has never had one and is looking for the best!
customer_reviews.author: 🍀🍀 GREEN IRISH EYES 🍀🍀

customer_reviews.title: Great pump.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pump along with a hands free bra from simple wishes and couldn't be happier. The tote bag is large enough to fit every thing I need for pumping at work Update: I'm using the same pump with my second child and I still really really like it. With my chest I pumped up to 7 times a day, with this one my supply is better so I only pump 4 times. The motor is still going strong and I have not noticed any decline in performance. I did replace the tubing as it had degraded a bit while in storage.
customer_reviews.author: pittiSA

customer_reviews.title: Great Pump
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pump. I used to have a Playtex one, and this one is hands down a better product. The pump changes speeds and frequency to simulate a real baby nursing, which is great. I purchased different flanges that fit me a little better, which helps. At first I wished that it had a silicone insert, but it is great without it. I do however need to use a pump "holder" support device of some sort with this one, or they will come off. (This is mine:
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pump! Get a pumping bra to save your arms.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pump. I got the tote bag and it's the perfect size to keep all the accessories with the pump and cart it around the city. I would definitely recommend a pumping bra since no one wants to sit there holding both bottles the entire 10 minutes you're pumping. Don't get the Medela brand one, it's very cheaply made and the zipper is not great. Go for this one:  (There's a reason it's the #1 best seller on amazon.)
customer_reviews.author: N Gammie

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for breastfeeding. I had an Amenda breast pump ...
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver for breastfeeding. I had an Amenda breast pump and not was not the right for me amd going back to work. Invested in this breast pump and ot sloved the issues i was having. Wish I would have look at the more expensive model for the rechargeable ability and on the go options. But i just invested in rechargeable batteries for the battery pack which is the most efficient when on the go but it drains the batteries very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Very good pump!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how portable it is with all the essentials in the bag. The pump is easy to use and gentle. My only complaint is the lack of rechargeable batteries. I don't like having to use 8 as batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Tam nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom I absolutely love this pump. In my opinion it's better than the pump they had me using in the hospital! It's easy to use and clean. I love that you can either plug it in or use the battery pack. I highly recommend this pump!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: Medela Pump in Style Advanced Breast Pump with Backpack, Double Electric Breastpump, Portable Battery Pack, Adjustable Speed and Vacuum, International Adaptor
product_meta.description: Color:Backpack w/Int'l AdaptorThe Medela Pump in Style Advanced with Backpack combines the award-winning Pump in Style Advanced double breast pump, which has consistently been chosen for over two decades by busy moms, with a discreet, stylish backpack for easy portability and transportation of the pump and all necessary accessories. Now includes convenient dual-voltage for 110-240V, allowing moms to easily use their Pump in Style Advanced Breast Pump while traveling outside the U.S. Engineered to more closely mimic a nursing baby with patented, research-based 2-Phase Expression technology which produces more milk in less time** for efficient expression and maximized flow. The microfiber backpack helps keep bottles, tubing, and other essential components and accessories neatly organized for convenient transport anywhere. Try the Medela Pump in Style Advanced with Backpack and find out why decades of moms have made Medela their first choice for all their breast milk feeding needs. What's Included: (1) Built-in breast pump; (1) Portable battery pack; (1) Removable cooler bag and (1) contoured ice pack; (4) 5-oz. 150 mL breast milk bottles with lids***; (1) Double pumping breast pump kit includes: 1 set of PersonalFit Breast Shields 24mm, 2 breast shield connectors, 2 valves and membranes, 1 set of tubing; (1) Power Adaptor dual-voltage 110/240V; Instructions for Use. *IQVIA ProVoice Survey; November 2017 – October 2018. **When comparing double pumping to single pumping, with 2-Phase Expression technology at Maximum Comfort Vacuum. ***All parts that touch breast milk are made without BPA.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY FOR SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE: Thanks to its patented and research-based 2-Phase Expression Technology, mothers can produce more milk in less time; this breastpump was made for optimal efficiency and maximized flow

CUSTOMIZABLE SETTINGS AND ACCESSORIES: Single knob adjustable speed and vacuum with one touch letdown button; Set of 24mm/medium size flanges allow moms to enhance their pumping experience, based on what’s most effective and comfortable
OVERFLOW PROTECTION: Closed system at the motor, which prevents milk from entering the motor; UL Listed; 120 VAC

INCLUDES: Built-in breastpump in backpack; Battery pack; Cooler bag and ice pack; (4) 5-oz. 150 mL bottles with lids; Double pumping kit: 1 set of 24mm flanges, 2 connectors, 2 valves and membranes, 1 set of tubing; 120 VAC; 60 Hz transformer

Founded in 1961, Medela has long been recognized as an expert advocate of breastfeeding through its development of innovative, research-based breastpump technology. As a result, is the #1 breast pump brand in America and the most recommended by doctors, chosen first by moms, and used most in hospitals*

DISCREET AND DURABLE BACKPACK: With built-in breastpump holds everything you need for portable and discreet pumping; Removable cooler bag holds ice pack and bottles to help your breastmilk stay cool while away from baby

specifications.Style: Pump In Style Backpack with International Adaptor
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,555 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
